item.title: Blog & Knowledge Management
item.description:
Awesome Documents

  • 2021-The documentation system ðŸ“š: There is a secret that needs to be understood in order to write good software documentation: there isnâ€™t one thing called documentation, there are four.

  • èµ„æºæ£€ç´¢ï¼šé¸ æ‘©æœç´¢ã€å¸ƒå…‹ä¹¦å±‹ã€ä¸‰ç§‹ä¹¦å±‹

  • 2018-SciHubEVA : Sci-Hub EVA is a cross-platform Sci-Hub GUI application.

Editor

  • yn : A Hackable Markdown Note Application for Programmers. Version control, AI completion, mind map, documents encryption, code snippet running, integrated terminal, chart embedding, HTML applets, plug-in, and macro replacement.

Markdown

  • glow : Render markdown on the CLI, with pizzazz! ðŸ’…ðŸ»

  • 2022-textual-markdown : This project is an experimental “Markdown browser” for the terminal, built with Textual.

Note Taking App

  • Trilium : Trilium Notes is a hierarchical note taking application with focus on building large personal knowledge bases.

  • 2019-Joplin : a note taking and to-do application with synchronization capabilities for Windows, macOS, Linux, Android and iOS.

  • 2021-Dendron : Dendron is an open-source, local-first, markdown-based, note-taking tool built on top of VSCode.

Knowledge Management

  • Foam : A personal knowledge management and sharing system for VSCode.

  • Archivy : Archivy is a self-hosted knowledge repository that allows you to safely preserve useful content that contributes to your knowledge bank.

  • logseq : A local-first, non-linear, outliner notebook for organizing and sharing your personal knowledge base. Use it to organize your todo list, to write your journals, or to record your unique life.

  • 2022-memos : An open-source, self-hosted memo hub for knowledge management and collaboration.

Collaborative Editingï¼ˆååŒç¼–è¾‘ï¼‰

  • gollum : Gollum is a simple wiki system built on top of Git. A Gollum Wiki is simply a git repository (either bare or regular) of a specific nature.

  • Wiki.js : A modern, lightweight and powerful wiki app built on NodeJS, Git and Markdown.

  • Realms Wiki Beta : Git based wiki written in Python Inspired by Gollum, Ghost, and Dillinger. Basic authentication and registration included.

Presentation

  • 2018-mdx deck : MDX-based presentation decks (Beta).

  • 2019-fusuma : Fusuma makes slides with Markdown easily.

  • 2021-Slidev : Presentation Slides for Developers (Public Beta ðŸŽ‰)

Blog

  • Gitfolio : Gitfolio will help you get started with a portfolio website where you could showcase your work + a blog that will help you spread your ideas into real world.

Documents

Notes & Todos

  • [æ»´ç­”æ¸…å•]

  • Joplin : a note taking and to-do application with synchronization capabilities for Windows, macOS, Linux, Android and iOS.

LaTeX

  • 2019-SwiftLaTeX : SwiftLaTeX is a Web-browser based editor to create PDF documents such as reports, term projects, slide decks, in the typesetting system LaTeX.

Documentation

  • mdBook : Create book from markdown files. Like Gitbook but implemented in Rust.

  • Docusaurus : Docusaurus is a project for building, deploying, and maintaining open source project websites easily.

Project Website

  • docsify : A magical documentation site generator.

  • 2017-Docusaurus : Docusaurus is a project for easily building, deploying, and maintaining open source project websites.

  • Docup : Docup is a single JavaScript file that fetches Markdown file and renders it as a beautiful one-page documentation.

API

  • 2013-DevDocs : DevDocs combines multiple developer documentations in a clean and organized web UI with instant search, offline support, mobile version, dark theme, keyboard shortcuts, and more.

  • gollum : A simple, Git-powered wiki with a sweet API and local frontend.

PDF

  • FalsiScan : Make it look like a PDF has been hand signed and scanned.

  • pdftabextract : A set of tools for extracting tables from PDF files helping to do data mining on (OCR-processed) scanned documents.

  • Paged.js : Paged.js is a free and open-source library that paginates any HTML content to produce beautiful print-ready PDF. The library fragments the content, reads your CSS print declarations and presents a paginated preview in your browser that you can save as PDF.

Publish | å‘å¸ƒå·¥å…·

item.title: CMD Processor
item.description:
CMD Processor

  • jq : jq is a lightweight and flexible command-line JSON processor.

  • 2020-Miller : Miller is like awk, sed, cut, join, and sort for data formats such as CSV, TSV, JSON, JSON Lines, and positionally-indexed.

item.title: Markdown Site
item.description:
Markdown Site

  • Gitbook: Modern documentation format and toolchain using Git and Markdown.

  • 2013-mdBook : mdBook is a utility to create modern online books from Markdown files.

  • beautiful-docs ðŸ—ƒï¸: Pointers to useful, well-written, and otherwise beautiful documentation.

  • Outline : The fastest wiki and knowledge base for growing teams. Beautiful, feature rich, markdown compatible and open source.

Document

  • 2016-mkdocs : MkDocs is a fast, simple and downright gorgeous static site generator that’s geared towards building project documentation. Documentation source files are written in Markdown, and configured with a single YAML configuration file.

    • 2020-mkdocs-material : Write your documentation in Markdown and create a professional static site for your Open Source or commercial project in minutes â€“ searchable, customizable, more than 50 languages, for all devices.

Project WebSite | é¡¹ç›®ä¸»é¡µ

  • 2013-Sphinx : Sphinx is a tool that makes it easy to create intelligent and beautiful documentation for Python projects (or other documents consisting of multiple reStructuredText sources), written by Georg Brandl.

  • 2017-Docusaurus : Docusaurus is a project for easily building, deploying, and maintaining open source project websites.

API Docs | æŽ¥å£æ–‡æ¡£

  • 2017-whiteboard : Simply write beautiful API documentation.

  • 2018-docz : It has never been so easy to document your things!
